aggregates.max: Max - The maximum value recorded during a time interval. A higher maximum value could have occurred without it being recorded.
aggregates.average: Avg - The average of values recorded during a time interval.
aggregates.total: Total - Sum of the values recorded for each node during a time interval.
aggregates.min: Min - The minimal value recorded during a time interval. A lower minimal value could have occurred without it being recorded.

solr-index-pool-queue-size2.description: Get the current size of each processing queues.
solr-index-pool-queue-size2.label: Search: IndexPool - Queue Size

nodesync-data-repaired.description: Bytes of data that were inconsistent and needed synchronization.
nodesync-data-repaired.label: NodeSync: Data Repaired

nodesync-data-validated.description: Bytes of data checked for consistency.
nodesync-data-validated.label: NodeSync: Data Validated

nodesync-repair-data-sent.description: Total bytes of data transferred between all nodes during synchronization.
nodesync-repair-data-sent.label: NodeSync: Repair Data Sent

nodesync-objects-repaired.description: Number of rows and range tombstones that were inconsistent and needed synchronization.
nodesync-objects-repaired.label: NodeSync: Objects Repaired

nodesync-objects-validated.description: Number of rows and range tombstones checked for consistency.
nodesync-objects-validated.label: NodeSync: Objects Validated

nodesync-repair-objects-sent.description: Total number of rows and range tombstones transferred between all nodes during synchronization.
nodesync-repair-objects-sent.label: NodeSync: Repair Objects Sent

nodesync-processed-pages.description: Number of pages (internal groupings of data) processed.
nodesync-processed-pages.label: NodeSync: Processed Pages

nodesync-full-in-sync-pages.description: Number of processed pages that were not in need of synchronization.
nodesync-full-in-sync-pages.label: NodeSync: Full In Sync Pages

nodesync-full-repaired-pages.description: Number of processed pages that were in need of synchronization.
nodesync-full-repaired-pages.label: NodeSync: Full Repaired Pages

nodesync-partial-in-sync-pages.description: Number of in sync pages for which a response was gotten from only a partial number of replicas.
nodesync-partial-in-sync-pages.label: NodeSync: Partial In Sync Pages

nodesync-partial-repaired-pages.description: Number of repaired pages for which a response was gotten from only a partial number of replicas.
nodesync-partial-repaired-pages.label: NodeSync: Partial Repaired Pages

nodesync-uncompleted-pages.description: Number of processed pages not having enough responses to perform synchronization.
nodesync-uncompleted-pages.label: NodeSync: Uncompleted Pages

nodesync-failed-pages.description: Number of processed pages for which an unknown error prevented proper synchronization completion.
nodesync-failed-pages.label: NodeSync: Failed Pages

nodesync-tbl-data-repaired.description: Bytes of data that were inconsistent and needed synchronization.
nodesync-tbl-data-repaired.label: NodeSync TBL: Data Repaired

nodesync-tbl-data-validated.description: Bytes of data checked for consistency.
nodesync-tbl-data-validated.label: NodeSync TBL: Data Validated

nodesync-tbl-repair-data-sent.description: Total bytes of data transferred between all nodes during synchronization.
nodesync-tbl-repair-data-sent.label: NodeSync TBL: Repair Data Sent

nodesync-tbl-objects-repaired.description: Number of rows and range tombstones that were inconsistent and needed synchronization.
nodesync-tbl-objects-repaired.label: NodeSync TBL: Objects Repaired

nodesync-tbl-objects-validated.description: Number of rows and range tombstones checked for consistency.
nodesync-tbl-objects-validated.label: NodeSync TBL: Objects Validated

nodesync-tbl-repair-objects-sent.description: Total number of rows and range tombstones transferred between all nodes during synchronization.
nodesync-tbl-repair-objects-sent.label: NodeSync TBL: Repair Objects Sent

nodesync-tbl-processed-pages.description: Number of pages (internal groupings of data) processed.
nodesync-tbl-processed-pages.label: NodeSync TBL: Processed Pages

nodesync-tbl-full-in-sync-pages.description: Number of processed pages that were not in need of synchronization.
nodesync-tbl-full-in-sync-pages.label: NodeSync TBL: Full In Sync Pages

nodesync-tbl-full-repaired-pages.description: Number of processed pages that were in need of synchronization.
nodesync-tbl-full-repaired-pages.label: NodeSync TBL: Full Repaired Pages

nodesync-tbl-partial-in-sync-pages.description: Number of in sync pages for which a response was gotten from only a partial number of replicas.
nodesync-tbl-partial-in-sync-pages.label: NodeSync TBL: Partial In Sync Pages

nodesync-tbl-partial-repaired-pages.description: Number of repaired pages for which a response was gotten from only a partial number of replicas.
nodesync-tbl-partial-repaired-pages.label: NodeSync TBL: Partial Repaired Pages

nodesync-tbl-uncompleted-pages.description: Number of processed pages not having enough responses to perform synchronization.
nodesync-tbl-uncompleted-pages.label: NodeSync TBL: Uncompleted Pages

nodesync-tbl-failed-pages.description: Number of processed pages for which an unknown error prevented proper synchronization completion.
nodesync-tbl-failed-pages.label: NodeSync TBL: Failed Pages

in-memory-percent-used.description: The percentage of memory allocated for in-memory tables currently in use.
in-memory-percent-used.label: In-Memory Percent Used

active-write-switch-for-memtable.label: TP: Write Switch For Memtable Active

completed-write-switch-for-memtable.label: TP: Write Switch For Memtable Completed

total-blocked-read-range-local.label: TP: Read Range Local Total Blocked

total-blocked-read-range-remote.label: TP: Read Range Remote Total Blocked

total-blocked-read-range-nodesync.label: TP: Read Range NodeSync Total Blocked

all-pending.description: Aggregate of thread pools pending queues that can be used to identify where things are backing up internally. This doesn't include pending compactions because it includes an estimate outside of the task queue or the hinted hand off queue, which can be in constant state of being on.
all-pending.label: Task Queues

active-write-await-commitlog-segment.label: TP: Write Await Commitlog Segment Active

active-read-switch-for-response.label: TP: Read Switch For Response Active

active-read-switch-for-iterator.label: TP: Read Switch For Iterator Active

active-read-range-switch-for-response.description: Read Range Switch For Response Active
active-read-range-switch-for-response.label: TP: Read Range Switch For Response Active

active-write-switch-for-response.label: TP: Write Switch For Response Active

active-write-await-commitlog-sync.label: TP: Write Await Commitlog Sync Active

completed-read-switch-for-response.label: TP: Read Switch For Response Completed

completed-read-switch-for-iterator.label: TP: Read Switch For Iterator Completed

completed-write-switch-for-response.label: TP: Write Switch For Response Completed

completed-write-await-commitlog-segment.label: TP: Write Await Commitlog Segment Completed

completed-read-range-switch-for-response.description: Read Range Switch For Response Completed
completed-read-range-switch-for-response.label: TP: Read Range Switch For Response Completed

completed-write-await-commitlog-sync.label: TP: Write Await Commitlog Sync Completed

all-dropped.description: Aggregate of all messages that have been dropped server-side due to not having been processed before their respective timeout.
all-dropped.label: Dropped Messages: All

dropped-counter-mutations.description: Mutation was seen after the timeout (write_request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. This client might have timed out before it met the required consistency level, but might have succeeded as well. Hinted handoffs and read repairs should resolve inconsistencies but a repair can ensure it.
dropped-counter-mutations.label: Dropped Messages: Counter Mutations

dropped-mutations.description: Mutation was seen after the timeout (write_request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. This client might have timed out before it met the required consistency level, but might have succeeded as well. Hinted handoffs and read repairs should resolve inconsistencies but a repair can ensure it.
dropped-mutations.label: Dropped Messages: Mutations

dropped-read-repairs.description: The Mutation was seen after the timeout (write_request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. With the read repair timeout, the node still exists in an inconsistent state.
dropped-read-repairs.label: Dropped Messages: Read Repairs

dropped-reads.description: A local read request was received after the timeout (read_request_timeout_in_ms) so it was thrown away because it would have already either been completed and sent to client or sent back as a timeout error.
dropped-reads.label: Dropped Messages: Reads

dropped-ranged-slice-reads.description: A local ranged read request was received after the timeout (range_request_timeout_in_ms) so it was thrown away because it would have already either been completed and sent to client or sent back as a timeout error.
dropped-ranged-slice-reads.label: Dropped Messages: Ranged Slice Reads

dropped-view-mutations.description: Mutation of Materialized View was seen after the timeout (write_request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. This client might have timed out before it met the required consistency level, but might have succeeded as well. Hinted handoffs and read repairs should resolve inconsistencies but a repair can ensure it.
dropped-view-mutations.label: Dropped Messages: Materialized View Mutations

dropped-lwt.description: Lightweight Transaction was seen after the timeout (write_request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. This client might have timed out before it met the required consistency level, but might have succeeded as well. Hinted handoffs and read repairs should resolve inconsistencies but a repair can ensure it.
dropped-lwt.label: Dropped Messages: Lightweight Transactions

dropped-hints.description: Hinted Handoff was seen after the timeout (write_request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. Repairing the data or using NodeSync, should resolve data inconsistencies.
dropped-hints.label: Dropped Messages: Hinted Handoffs

dropped-truncates.description: Truncate operation was seen after the timeout (truncate_request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away.
dropped-truncates.label: Dropped Messages: Truncate Operations

dropped-snapshots.description: Snapshot Request was seen after the timeout (request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. Snapshot should be retried.
dropped-snapshots.label: Dropped Messages: Snapshot Requests

dropped-schemas.description: Schema change was seen after the timeout (request_timeout_in_ms) so was thrown away. Schema agreement may not have been reached immediately, but this will eventually resolve itself.
dropped-schemas.label: Dropped Messages: Schema Changes

dropped-repairs.description: Repair message was seen after the timeout so was thrown away.
dropped-repairs.label: Dropped Messages: Repair Messages

dropped-other.description: Miscellaneous message was seen after the timeout so was thrown away.
dropped-other.label: Dropped Messages: Miscellaneous

dropped-node-sync.description: NodeSync message was seen after the timeout so was thrown away.
dropped-node-sync.label: Dropped Messages: NodeSync

dropped-batch-store.description: Batch store message was seen after the timeout so was thrown away.
dropped-batch-store.label: Dropped Messages: Batch Store
